sections.title: Overview
sections.content: The Application Manager provides essential tools for maintaining customer accounts, order fulfillment, catalog management, and business parameters within inPowerSuite.

panels.title: Customer Management
listItems: Customer service module for managing customer inquiries
Customer account adjustments and other CRM functionality

panels.title: Genealogy Management
listItems: Member service module for managing member, sponsor and enroller changes and reassignments

panels.title: Merchandising Management
listItems: Configure sellable items with style/color/size matrices and multiple price-lists / volume-pricing / availability by customer type

panels.title: Product Management
listItems: Module for managing up-sells, side-sells, mix and match, kits, bundles, BOGOs, store coupons, promotions and more

panels.title: Order Management
listItems: Customer service module for processing item adjustments, cancellations, returns and related refunds/commission claw-backs

panels.title: Party Management
listItems: Module for managing party types, invitation emails, host rewards and more
